title: Sergei Skripal recovering 'rapidly': hospital
text:
Sergei Skripal recovering 'rapidly': hospital 3:37pm BST - 00:52 
Former Russian double agent Sergei Skripal is no longer in critical condition, according to the British hospital treating him, a day after his daughter made her first public statement since the incident in which they were both poisoned. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
